# 👋 Welcome!

Hi, I'm **Marvin Castrejon**, a graduate student in **Digital Marketing** at **Cal Poly Pomona**.

This site showcases my term project on **customer satisfaction in the airline industry**, based on a large-scale passenger survey from **United Airlines**.

---

## 🔧 Project Summary

- **✈️ Focus**: Exploring what drives satisfaction using demographic and service data  
- **📊 Tools Used**: R, Quarto, RevealJS, logistic regression, and marginal effects  
- **🎯 Outcome**: Actionable insights for digital marketing and operational improvements

---

## 💡 Interests

- Data storytelling & reproducible reporting  
- Ethical AI policy in education & business  
- Applied marketing analytics & consumer behavior
